text: @SpeakerPelosi Nancy while you were pushing impeachment China was pushing lies on coronavirus but your mind n all politicians minds were not on coronavirus it was on impeachment n then when u guys woke up it was too late coronavirus was here! I blame all politicians but democrats most!
